name: Here and Now: Edition 3
description:
Entry Coin for Here and Now Edition 3 
Created by Beets (@wideawakebeets)

HOW IT WORKS
In order to gain access to the 3d interactive experience you must burn 1x coin. Once burnt you will be sent a 1/1 Here and Now ticket (on certain dates listed below). If you know the artist making the ticket by now, great, if you don't, you'll just have to wait :)

----

KEY DATES: 

9-20th September: Reservations open for current ticket holders of Edition One and Two only with a max purchase of x3 coins. Visit the private discord for an early reservation form, or DM. 

15th- 20th September: Reservation form made available for non-ticket holders of past editions with a max purchase of one coin. Follow Beets and look out for the form on Sept 15th. There will be a guarantee of 300 at the very least available. 

20th September: If demand exceeds supply for non-ticket holders of past editions, then a raffle will take place for fair distribution. 

22nd September: If there are tickets remaining then the coin will be swapped and it will be a race to the finish. 

1/1 Release Dates (if you burn your coin before each date below, you will receive it then):
Sept 25th | October 1st | October 6 | October 13

15th September: Here and Now Official Launch date

---

Here and Now: https://wideawakeprojects.com/here-and-now/

Edition Two Shvembldr tickets on secondary:
https://nftbiker.xyz/search?search=here+and+now%3A+edition+two&sort=price
